Elements.Name: IncludeDir0
Description: Choose which Cyberspace physics configuration to use for Amy, Tails and Knuckles.
A physics preset made by Weezley! This preset mimicks Sonic's Cyberspace physics, with some small adjustments like improved wallclimbing for Knuckles.
